FuncDef:
The max-sessions command sets the maximum number of clients for the NETCONF service.
The undo max-sessions command restores the default maximum number of clients that are connected to the server for NETCONF service. The max-sessions command sets the maximum number of clients for the NETCONF service. The undo max-sessions command restores the default maximum number of clients that are connected to the server for NETCONF service. The default maximum number of clients is 15.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the maximum number of NETCONF sessions.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 15. The default value is 5.

ExtraInfo: To set the maximum number of NETCONF clients that can be connected to a server at any point, run the max-sessions command.
